title: Raf Simons leaving Dior after 3-and-a-half years
text: PARIS - Raf Simons has quit as creative director at Christian Dior after more than three years, the fashion house said Thursday. Bangkok Post 2 hours ago - World Raf Simons is stepping down as the creative director at Christian Dior after three and a half years at the position. The 47-year-old designer said he â€œreached...
